body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Billy Flores and the customer's name is Patricia Williams.  The conversation is about Happy Animal Shelter (a Animal Shelter ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling ABC Services. My name is John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi John, I have some questions about my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to help with that. May I please have your name to start?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Emily Smith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emily. Can you please provide me with your order number and your email address associated with the order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, the order number is one two three four five six, and my email address is emily.smith@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Let me look up your order details. One moment, please.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I see your order here, Emily. It looks like it's scheduled for delivery tomorrow. Is there anything else I can help you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all I needed to know. Thank you!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time, Emily. Have a great day!
